settings.type: How we use information we collect
settings.question: 2.1 We only use your personal information where the law allows us to. We use your personal information only where:

settings.type: How we use information we collect
settings.question: 2.2 If you have given us consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose, you have the right to withdraw your consent any time by contacting us (please refer to paragraph 8 for contact information)
settings.answer: But please note this will not affect any use of your information that has already taken place.
